@description.name: @description
@description.body: Contains methods to control and query the element's clip property

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Compiles the given clipping into a CSS compatible string. This is a simple square which describes the visible area of an DOM element. Changing the clipping does not change the dimensions of an element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: map {Map} Map which contains left, top width and height of the clipped area.
@param.description: Map which contains left, top width and height of the clipped area.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the clipping of the given element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
mode {Number} Choose one of the modes {@link qx.bom.element.Style#COMPUTED_MODE},
   {@link qx.bom.element.Style#CASCADED_MODE}, {@link qx.bom.element.Style#LOCAL_MODE}.
   The computed mode is the default one.
@param.description:
Choose one of the modes {@link qx.bom.element.Style#COMPUTED_MODE},
   {@link qx.bom.element.Style#CASCADED_MODE}, {@link qx.bom.element.Style#LOCAL_MODE}.
   The computed mode is the default one.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Map which contains left, top width and height of the clipped area. Each one could be null or any integer value.
@return.description: Map which contains left, top width and height of the clipped area. Each one could be null or any integer value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the clipping of the given element. This is a simple square which describes the visible area of an DOM element. Changing the clipping does not change the dimensions of an element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: map {Map} A map with one or more of these available keys: left, top, width, height.
@param.description: A map with one or more of these available keys: left, top, width, height.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the clipping of the given DOM element.
